scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../client && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../server
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
scripts.github:sync: cd ../server-github && rm -rf build && cp -r ../server/build ../server-github && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin HEAD
